newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar closes flat in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar closes flat in quiet trade.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed flat at 474.25/475.25 per dollar in quiet trade as the Central Bank supplied a gentle but constant stream of dollars to the market, traders said.
"The Bank covered most dollar requests, halting any rises through 475 bolivars per dollar," said one trader.
Traders reported little if any effect on the exchange market of today's five point back-up in interest rates.
"The rise in TEM yields didn't register in the exchange market," said another trader.
